title: NCR Corporation | Software Engineer 2 | Hyderabad
content:
Education: BSc - IT
YOE: 3.4 yrs as frontend dev
Date of offer: Dec 2023
Past company: Product based MNC
Current salary: 13 lakh base
Current location: Bangalore

Role: Software Engineer 2
Location: Hyderabad
Base: 17.75 lakh
Joining bonus: 2 lakh
Annual Bonus: NA
Relocation: 20k rupees, additionally the expenses of flight, 14 days hotel, packers/movers covered
Stocks: NA
CTC: around 20.50 lakh

Rejected this offer immediately as less than expected. HR called after 4 days and agreed to match 20 lakh base, but I already had another offer of 20 lakh base in pipeline. After two days HR asked for the offer letter of 20 lakh I received from other company, without which they wont be able to match the base salary. Strange! Again, I rejected this request and mailed the HR to opt out from interview process. After 2 days got call from HR, they agreed to match expectations even without sharing competing offer.

New offer as per telephonic discussion:
Base: 20 lakh
Joining bonus: 2 lakh
CTC: around 23 lakh

Received many calls and texts in these 2 weeks even after rejecting offer multiple times. Literally felt like bargaining in fish market. I was very frustrated with this negotiation. I was really planning to join if HR had matched expected salary in beginning of discussion. But I am not a fan of this type of culture, so decided to move ahead with another company.
